name: GlossBeautyBar
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This is your local Flash Briefing to help you get the latest information from Gloss Beauty Bar.

A flash briefing provides a quick overview of news and other content such as comedy, interviews, and lists. A flash briefing skill provides content for a customer's flash briefing. The flash briefing skill API defines the format of content and enables you to create flash briefing skills.

Customers discover and enable flash briefing skills in the flash briefing section under Settings in the app, or by searching for "flash briefing" in the skills section of the app. Customers can also enable their favorite provider through voice, the first time they listen to the flash briefing.

When you create a flash briefing skill, you have a chance for your original content to reach customers daily. Update your content at least daily, and you can make changes as often as every 15 minutes. The system caches your content to ensure optimal performance and minimal latency for customers.

Visit us at https://www.propertyswarm.io for more information or to learn more about our marketing platform.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
